long_description: The Timex Expedition Shock watch boasts durability and rugged style along with a full suite of convenient functions for your expeditions across town or into the wilderness. Large, easy-to-read digital face displays the time, day and date. 100-hr. chronograph features lap or split option; lap counter tracks up to 99 laps; 24-hr. countdown timer has countdown/stop and countdown/repeat modes. 3 alarms can be set for day, weekday, weekend and week with 5 min. snooze. 2 time zone settings make traveling easy; 12- or 24-hour time format suits your personal preference. INDIGLO(R) night light illuminates the display for easy use at night. Lightweight, strong resin case and strap stand up to heavy use during your outdoor adventures. The Timex Expedition Shock watch is water-resistant to 100m (330 ft.).
short_description: The Timex Expedition Shock watch boasts durability and rugged style along with a full suite of convenient functions for your expeditions across town or into the wilderness.
